credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 4 x 1 3/4 in. (10.2 x 4.4 cm)
rim: 1 1/8 in. (2.8 cm)
title: Unguentarium
description: Natural pale-green glass. Low-bellied, pear shaped body. Narrow, tubular neck with constriction at base. Small, flattened rim folded in. Film of bright purple, blue, green iridescence. Some soil incrustation inside and outside.
